words.defineEn: a sudden and short sound, word or phrase, uttered to express anger, excitement, etc.
words.defineVi: một âm thanh, từ hoặc cụm từ đột ngột và ngắn, được thốt ra để thể hiện sự tức giận, phấn khích, v.v.

examples: You’re just silly.
Stop inventing silly excuses.
It was a classic example of the saying 'ask a silly question and get a silly answer.'
When his friends teased him about his silly hat, he laughed along and played along with the joke.
It was a classic example of the saying 'ask a silly question and get a silly answer.'
words.defineEn: feeling embarrassed or stupid
words.defineVi: cảm thấy xấu hổ hoặc ngu ngốc

examples: He's just brilliant.
Three cheers for Sarah, whose brilliant goal at the last minute won us the game!
That was a brilliant pass by Holden.
It's a brilliant place for hearing about jobs through the grapevine.
He had a nose for trouble and a brilliant tactical mind.
words.defineEn: exceptionally impressive, excellent, or outstanding
words.defineVi: đặc biệt ấn tượng, xuất sắc, hoặc nổi bật

examples: Trump's maximum pressure campaign failed utterly.
The thumb is utterly unique.
But her schedule was utterly unpredictable.
They are utterly without laws, conscience or respect for human life.
The utterly chaotic scenes in World War Z legitimately give me anxiety.
words.defineEn: (used for emphasis) to the fullest degree or extent
words.defineVi: (được sử dụng để nhấn mạnh) ở mức độ hoặc mức độ đầy đủ nhất

examples: This is rubbish!
Each 180-litre container will hold up to three black bags of rubbish.
Each 180-litre container will hold up to three black bags of rubbish.
The thing is, you're rubbish at copying your own code.
When he saw that people used the Holy Mount in the middle of the town as a place for rubbish, he started to clean it with his own hands.
words.defineEn: words or ideas that are considered to be false or of no value
words.defineVi: những từ hoặc ý tưởng được coi là sai hoặc không có giá trị

examples: Her voice broke as she told us the dreadful news.
The scales have finally fallen from his eyes and he realises that he's made a dreadful mistake.
But the measles virus uses a dreadful tactic.
This is a dreadful mistake.
This is a dreadful mistake.
words.defineEn: very bad
words.defineVi: rất tệ

examples: I found the house in a mess.
You've made a terrible mess of this job.
To make a noise/mess/fuss.
to make a noise/mess/fuss
He knows better than to mess with a good customer.
words.defineEn: a situation with many problems or difficulties, caused particularly by someone who is careless
words.defineVi: một tình huống có nhiều vấn đề hoặc khó khăn, đặc biệt do ai đó bất cẩn gây ra

examples: She said an awful lot
The incident says an awful lot about his character.
It's awful having a boss who breathes down your neck all the time.
I told you that you'd feel awful if you drank that much wine.
He couldn't help but grimace when he saw the awful outfit his friend was wearing.
words.defineEn: extremely unpleasant, bad, or disagreeable
words.defineVi: cực kỳ khó chịu, xấu, hoặc khó chịu

examples: The old lady's cake wasn't wonderful
Doesn’t Rosie look wonderful?
Squash adds a wonderful texture and sweetness to curries.
Since the news broke I've received thousands of wonderful letters.
To my eye, Jake, you're the most wonderful man on the planet.
words.defineEn: very great and pleasant
words.defineVi: rất tuyệt vời và dễ chịu

examples: Morning brought no relief from the heat.
He felt a sense of relief when the doctor assured him that his stomach issue was temporary.
He applied a few drops of spikenard oil to his temples, finding relief from his headache.
During the dog days of summer, the temperatures soar, and people seek relief by staying indoors or swimming in pools.
Even though I love traveling and seeing new places, I always feel a sense of relief when I return to my own house.
words.defineEn: a feeling of comfort that comes when something annoying or upsetting is gone
words.defineVi: một cảm giác thoải mái đến khi một cái gì đó gây phiền nhiễu hoặc khó chịu đã biến mất

examples: The team took a terrible beating.
You've made a terrible mess of this job.
I had terrible butterflies before I gave that talk in Venice.
The situation was terrible, but like many politicians he was attracted by troubled waters.
The entire region has been in the grip of a terrible drought.
words.defineEn: very bad, disagreeable, or unpleasant
words.defineVi: rất xấu, khó chịu, hoặc khó chịu

examples: The paneer curry smells amazing!
It’s amazing.
My mom is an amazing cook.
It is amazing really.
That's amazing Ralph.
words.defineEn: extremely surprising, particularly in a good way
words.defineVi: cực kỳ ngạc nhiên, đặc biệt là trong một cách tốt

examples: The play was too funny for words.
He always tells funny jokes that make everyone laugh.
I saw some really funny pictures of myself as a kid and I couldn't believe what a minger I was.
She imagined kids making funny faces after trying scorzonera for the first time.
We spent the evening watching funny movies and she felt much better.
words.defineEn: able to make people laugh
words.defineVi: có thể làm cho mọi người cười

examples: Scorpion was disgusting rehearsal.
That's disgusting.
This is disgusting.
- That's disgusting.
- It looks disgusting.
words.defineEn: describing something that is very unpleasant
words.defineVi: mô tả một cái gì đó là rất khó chịu

examples: Oops, spilling a little bit.

Oops, yeah, I just suck at racing games, feels great other than that rumble issue, if I were you I would check out some other reviews and see if they've had the same problem, before pulling the trigger so to speak.
words.defineEn: used to acknowledge a small mistake or a minor accident, often expressing regret, surprise, or embarrassment
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để thừa nhận một lỗi nhỏ hoặc một tai nạn nhỏ, thường bày tỏ sự hối tiếc, ngạc nhiên hoặc bối rối

examples: Phew ok that was a heck of a lot of court cases.
I mean, when I got this news, I honestly thought, "Phew."
So, the sodium-potassium pumps get back to work and burn some ATP to pump the sodium back out and the potassium back in, and phew!
Phew, they’re done.
Imagine that you’re out of toilet paper, so you put on your face mask and rush down to your corner market and find out that (phew!)
words.defineEn: used to express relief or exhaustion, often after a difficult or challenging situation
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để thể hiện sự nhẹ nhõm hoặc kiệt sức, thường là sau một tình huống khó khăn hoặc thử thách

examples: So the yucks are real, but the volume, duration, and pitch can be slightly altered to smooth out the rough edges.
So when did canned laughter and fake yucks emerge?
Miasmas were thought to emanate from foul smelling and unsanitary living conditions like human waste (yuck), dirty water and rotting food.
words.defineEn: used to express disgust or strong dislike towards something
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để thể hiện sự ghê tởm hoặc không thích mạnh mẽ đối với một cái gì đó

examples: Oh, give me strength!
Oh woe is me!
Oh, that takes the cake!
Oh, did you bonk your elbow?
Oh yes, enough said.
words.defineEn: a word used when we hear something new that we did not know before
words.defineVi: một từ được sử dụng khi chúng ta nghe một cái gì đó mới mà chúng ta không biết trước

examples: I mean, duh.
I mean, like, duh.
- I'm sorry, duh.
First of all, if you're a YouTuber, caption it, duh.
- Duh! - Okay, dare me to call Kyle and tell him to bring the boys over?
words.defineEn: used to indicate that something is obvious or known already, often in a sarcastic or humorous way
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ ra rằng một cái gì đó là rõ ràng hoặc đã được biết đến, thường theo cách châm biếm hoặc hài hước

examples: Ouch, that really hurt.
Now if at any point he does bite me, I do my best not to react Don't react to a bird bite by saying ouch or yelling, or anything like that.
words.defineEn: used to express sudden pain or discomfort, often when experiencing a minor injury or bump
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để thể hiện sự đau đớn hoặc khó chịu đột ngột, thường là khi bị thương nhẹ hoặc va chạm

examples: Wow, all his geese are swans, all right!
Wow, it's a small world.
Wow, all that beer has left me feeling terrible this morning.
Wow, they really turned the tide on their opponents by scoring 20 unanswered points!
Wow, Anna has really come out of her shell lately.
words.defineEn: a word we use when we are happy or surprised
words.defineVi: một từ chúng tôi sử dụng khi chúng tôi hạnh phúc hoặc ngạc nhiên

examples: - Mmm, that's good!
- Bit if I-- - Fly that Dutchman. - Mmm. -
Mmm, that is saltier, yeah.
Mmm, bubbles.
- Mmm - Who has like a big watermelon stomach -
words.defineEn: used to indicate pleasure, enjoyment, or satisfaction
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để biểu thị niềm vui, sự thích thú hoặc sự hài lòng

examples: Digging a tunnel, eh?
- Eh, terrified.
War suppressing civil liberties, eh?
Eh, it was.
Seems pretty hopeless, eh?
words.defineEn: used to seek clarification, repetition, or agreement
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để tìm kiếm làm rõ, lặp lại, hoặc thỏa thuận

words.defineEn: used to represent laughter or amusement in a casual or sarcastic manner
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để đại diện cho tiếng cười hoặc giải trí một cách bình thường hoặc châm biếm
